Scoring darts has never been easier. Dart Scorer Cricket and X01 allows you to keep track of your cricket, X01, Around The Clock and Shanghai game scores. Play with 2, 3 and 4 players or play on your own against our Score Bot AI to perfect your dart throwing skills. 

Use AirPlay and Apple TV to project a completely custom score board (unique from your iPhone screen) for all players to follow along with the game score and stats.

Matches are saved so you can start as many different dart games as you like and come back to them later. 

Cricket:
* Up to 4 players in standard cricket, cut-throat and no points modes.
* Play single player Cricket against Score Bot, our dart throwing AI, with easy, medium and hard difficulty levels.
* Stats for marks per round saved for each match and every player.

X01:
* Up to 4 players in X01 with 101, 301, 501, 701, 901 and 1001 modes.
* Play single player X01 against Score Bot, our dart throwing AI, with easy, medium and hard difficulty levels.
* X01 options include straight in, double in or triple in for first throw. 
* X01 options include straight out, double out or triple out for close out.
* X01 scoring suggestions appear directly on the dart board. The recommended target will appear bright green.

Around The Clock:
* Up to 4 players in Around The Clock 
* Custom option to end on 20 or on bullseye

Shanghai:
* Up to 4 players in Shanghai
* Play 7, 10, 15 or 20 round Shanghai.

Game Features:
* Save matches and game history with support for multiple games in progress. 
* Intuitive scoring system with 3D touch support for clean and simple UI.
* Detailed match history allows you to transfer games to league scoresheets.
* Track misses and any non-scoring dart throws.
* Track player progress with win %, matches played, marks per round (cricket), points per dart (x01) and 3 dart average (x01) history for all games played.
* Eliminates math error with score totals.
* Leading player name turns gold to easily see who is winning.
* X01 Score Assistant helps you decide where to aim. 
* Get further assistance using our 3-Dart and 2-Dart checkout tables.
* Undo button allows you to fix any mistakes.
* Score dart throws with your voice. Simply tap and hold the microphone button and speak your scores and we will enter them automatically.
* In-game commentary nudges players when it's their turn to throw and awards you with positive feedback when you do well.
* Add/edit players and track player progress.
* Upload player avatars.
* Completed match screen shows player rank and number of darts thrown by winning player.
* View in-game stats including Marks Per Round for cricket games and Points per dart & 3 Dart Avg for X01 games.
* View player stats including Marks Per Round for cricket and Points Per Dart for X01. Player stats can be filtered based on opponent.
* View Dart game match results that include Marks Per Round for cricket games and Points Per Dart for X01 games.
* Customize your experience with game options, custom sound effects and themes.
* iPad Pro and iPhone X support.

How to score:
* Single, double or triple tap a dart button to score a single, double or triple respectively, or long press a dart button to score.
* Tap the miss button to record a miss.
* Tap the next (forward arrow) button to move to the next players turn.
* Tap the undo (back arrow) button to undo the last throw.
* Tap the reset button to restart the current game.
* Or, you can tap and hold the microphone button to speak your score. For example, you can say things like "Double 19, Triple 16, Miss", then release the microphone button to apply the score.

Additional Info and Feedback:
* View Rules of each game from within the app by going to Settings > Game Rules
* Help us improve Dart Scorer Cricket and X01 by going to Settings > Leave Feedback

Manage Airsoft tournaments and games!

Airsoft Tournament uses the same database on the cloud and is compatible with every smartphone. It allows the organizers, in the preparatory phase, to insert objectives, waypoints, interdiction patrols, referees and scores. Automatically it generate the printing of signs with QR code. Team operators can scan QR code via app, by waypoint, recon, infiltration and exfiltration. They can also sign referees' reports with their own QR code. In real time the organization will receive all the information and the final ranking will be calculated automatically. Operation guaranteed even in the absence of connectivity, with periodic remote synchronization. The app complies with the regulations in force for the soft-air game for long and short range patrols.

Tournaments: possibility to enter descriptive information about the game, location, duration, weather conditions, difficulty etc. Tournaments are distinguished from organized tournaments and those you have access by invitation (teams or referees).

Teams: personal data of the participating teams, with the selection of a contact person and contacts in order to make a call or send a text message to the team. Composition of the chromatic band assigned through a personalized selection of colors (from one to four per band), images for team logo and players profile. Invitation via E-Mail, which allows all team operators to access the tournament as participants.

Objectives: management and creation with description, coordinates and distinction of type: Combat, Waypoint, Action, Presidium, Recon, Vehicle, Escort, Firefight, Domination etc. For the same type, up to 100 objectives can be automatically generated with a single entry. The objective recon also gives the possibility to create a customizable number of signs to consider the acquired objective. It is possible to associate a referee and a score on the objectives, with the combination of one or more secondary objectives of the action type; it will also be possible to indicate the presence of a window of engagement, validity and visibility.

Signs: each objective created automatically generates a sign. Waypoints and Recons generate a sign with a QR code or a numeric code. The team will be able to acquire the score by scanning or by returning the code to the device. Infiltration and exfiltration signs can be generated, which sanction the start and end of the game for each team. The signs are generated in a printable PDF.
Interdiction patrols: you can assign a number and a name to the interdiction patrols, with the list of players that make it up. For the patrol, as for the objectives, it is possible to define a referee.

Scores: scores can be associated to each objective (engagement, conquest, defenders eliminated, out-of-window penalties, highlanders, operators not in pairs etc…). Scores are divided into positive and negative, self-calculating scores that occur under certain conditions, and scores awarded by referees to assign game penalties.
Referees: management of a registry of referees in order to assign them objectives or interdiction patrols, and to be able to contact them by phone call or text message directly from the app. Referees can also be secondary admins of the tournament.
Map: visualization of the topographic map with realtime position of objectives, referees and teams in play.
Monitoring and ranking: when the tournament has started the referees can enter the results of the engagements via the app, with the effective duration of the window and any penalties. At the end of the game, the ranking will be calculated, where the admin can make corrections in the results.
